title: Active Storage on Heroku | Heroku Dev Center
excerpt: Rails [5.2 introduced Active Storage](https://guides.rubyonrails.org/active_storage_overview.html) as a way of managing attaching and saving files to Active Record models. This guide will cover how to use Active Storage on Heroku.
